lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bousquet said the company, among other things, was accused of not properly investigating financial transactions and of issuing a favorable opinion in August 1985 that relied on misrepresentations of Technical Equities management.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We basically charged that the Technical Equities audit was not conducted in accordance with generally accepted auditing standards," Della Bousquet, executive officer for the board, told Reuters in a telephone interview.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: She said a hearing would probably be held before an administrative law judge within three months.
